troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting (Quick Solutions)
troubleshooting.description: Main i18n errors and how to solve them quickly.

typo.title: Typo in key
typo.error: Translation does not appear (typo in key)
typo.solution: Use TypeScript autocomplete to avoid mistakes.
typo.codeError:
const t = useTranslations("auth");
t("login.tittle"); // typo: 'tittle' instead of 'title'
typo.codeSolution:
const t = useTranslations("auth");
t("login.title"); // TypeScript warns if wrong

namespace.title: Wrong namespace
namespace.solution: Use the correct namespace for each message group.
namespace.codeError:
const t = useTranslations("admin");
t("actions.save"); // 'actions' is in 'global'!

ptLeak.title: Portuguese leaking in other languages
ptLeak.solution: Re-translate with force and validate with scripts.
ptLeak.codeSolution:
pnpm run translate:force
pnpm run check:pt-leaks

tsAutocomplete.title: TypeScript autocomplete not working
tsAutocomplete.error: TypeScript does not suggest keys or shows false errors
tsAutocomplete.solution: Restart TS Server or reload VS Code.
tsAutocomplete.codeError: // Possible cause: TypeScript did not update
tsAutocomplete.codeSolution:
// Ctrl+Shift+P â†’ 'TypeScript: Restart TS Server'
// If not resolved: Reload Window
tsAutocomplete.extraTip: Extra tip: If autocomplete/typing does not work for the new block, add the namespace in messages/pt-BR/index.ts, src/i18n/types.d.ts and src/lib/i18n/load-messages.ts as described in the docs.

missingFile.title: Translation file not found
missingFile.solution: Save all files and restart TS Server.
missingFile.codeError: # Possible cause: New file was not saved
missingFile.codeSolution: # Ctrl+K S (VS Code) and restart TS Server

newVsLegacy.title: New Project vs Legacy Project
newVsLegacy.description: How to approach internationalization (i18n) in different project contexts? See practical tips for each scenario:

new.title: New Project (Greenfield)
items: Plan namespaces and message structure from the start.
Implement i18n before creating many components.
Use Quick Start examples to speed up setup.
Automate scripts and validations from day one.
Standardize keys and conventions for the team.

legacy.title: Legacy Project (Ongoing)
items: Map hardcoded texts and prioritize the most used.
Migrate components gradually to i18n.
Use validation scripts to avoid regressions.
Centralize global texts before modularizing.
Document standards and create migration examples.

newVsLegacy.tip: For migration, create a visual checklist and involve the team in i18n-focused PR reviews.

liveDemo.title: Interactive Demo
liveDemo.subtitle: See the translation happening in real time

sourceOfTruth.title: pt-BR as a Source of Truth
sourceOfTruth.description: All translations are based on Portuguese. The en/ and es/ files are generated automatically via scripts, ensuring consistency and eliminating manual duplication.

autoTranslation.title: Automatic Translation
autoTranslation.description: Intelligent scripts detect new keys in pt-BR and automatically translate them using the DeepL API (preferred) or Google Cloud Translation with rate limiting.

typeSafety.title: Complete Type Safety
typeSafety.description: TypeScript with autocomplete for all namespaces and keys. The compiler warns if a translation key is wrong or missing parameters.

qualityControl.title: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: Validation scripts detect Portuguese leaks in en/es, verify key synchronization between languages, and can be integrated into CI/CD.

translationEngine.title: Automatic Translation
translationEngine.subtitle: DeepL API - 500k characters/month free

quality.title: Superior Quality
quality.description: DeepL offers more natural translations than Google Translate

buildTime.title: Build-Time Only
buildTime.description: Translation happens before the build, zero impact on runtime

free.title: 500k Free/Month
free.description: Free plan sufficient for most projects

translationEngine.tip: The free plan from DeepL offers 500,000 characters per month, enough for ~50 pages of content. Perfect for startups and personal projects.

performance.title: Zero Impact on Performance
performance.subtitle: Translations loaded at build time, not at runtime

buildTime.title: Build-Time
buildTime.description: All translations are processed during the build. The final bundle only contains the necessary language.

bundle.title: Optimized Bundle
bundle.description: Each locale has its own bundle. Users only download the language they are using.

typeSafe.title: Type-Safe
typeSafe.description: TypeScript validates all keys during development. It is impossible to use a non-existent key.

github.title: Use Este Template
github.description: Complete repository with the entire i18n structure, automation scripts, and documentation. Ready for use in production.

useTranslations.title: useTranslations()
useTranslations.description: Main hook for Client Components. Receives the namespace and returns the t() function with complete autocomplete.

getTranslations.title: getTranslations()
getTranslations.description: Async function for Server Components and Server Actions. Ideal for SSR pages and server actions.

namespaces.title: Namespaces Modular
namespaces.description: Hierarchical organization: global.actions.save, admin.userManagement.form. Combines specific namespaces with global ones for reuse.

pluralization.title: Pluralization ICU
pluralization.description: Support for ICU Message Format for intelligent pluralization: =0 {nenhum}, =1 {1 item}, other {# itens}.

interpolation.title: Interpolation of Variables
interpolation.description: Dynamic variables with {placeholder}. Supports multiple parameters: "{user} created {count} plants."

dateFormatting.title: Date/Number Formatting
dateFormatting.description: Uses the browser's native Intl.DateTimeFormat and Intl.NumberFormat, respecting the selected locale for date, currency, and number formatting.

steps.title: Edit pt-BR
steps.description: Add or edit the translation keys in the corresponding JSON file in messages/en-US/.

steps.title: Generate Translations
steps.description: Run the script that detects new keys and automatically translates them into EN and ES.

steps.title: Validate Quality
steps.description: Check that there are no Portuguese leaks in the translations and that all languages are synchronized.

steps.title: Validate Synchronization
steps.description: Confirm that all locations have the same keys to avoid errors in production.

steps.title: Use no code
steps.description: Import the useTranslations hook with the correct namespace and use t() to access translations with autocomplete.

items.description: Translate only new keys from pt-BR to en/es. Preserve existing translations.
Re-translate ALL keys from scratch. Use when you encounter poor translations.
Validates whether all locations have the same synchronized keys.
Detects Portuguese words leaking into en/es files.
Creates a complete structure for a new language (e.g., de, fr, it).

do.title: Faca
items: ALWAYS edit pt-BR first (true source)
Use namespaces descritivos: auth, global, admin.userManagement
Reuse global texts for common actions (save, cancel)
Rode translate + validate antes de commitar
Use placeholders {variavel} para conteudo dinamico
Combine specific + global namespaces in the same component

dont.title: Avoid
items: NEVER edit en/es manually (they will be overwritten).
Do not leave hardcoded text in JSX
Avoid duplicating texts that already exist globally.
Do not concatenate translated strings (grammar break)
Do not use excessively long keys.
Do not create generic namespaces such as 'page1' or 'form'.

structure.title: File Structure
structure.subtitle: Organization of the messaging system
structure.description: en-US and the source of truth. en/ and es/ are generated automatically. Each module has its own folder with its own index.ts.

cta.title: Ready to implement?
cta.description: This i18n system demonstrates a production-ready architecture with type safety, automation, and quality. All built with next-intl v4+.
